alert.note: Alert for Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 2:42PM EST until January 29 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of Upstate South Carolina, northeast Georgia and western North Carolina. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...the strongest winds are expected Friday night after midnight, especially along the Blue Ridge escarpment and nearby locations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
